title: MOTHER'S DAY Madness
body_text:
DIBUCCIO vs. MULLINS Results from CXXXVII!
"Mom" must be so proud!
Flash Results by Game
... Mullins: 1, 3; DiBuccio: 2, 4
The warriors of Wall High School fought through four physically agonizing rounds only to be shafted of a final result. It's a safe bet that this issue is far from being settled as a rematch for next week's DODGEBALL CXXXVIII has already been signed.
The Rules
: Classic two-team match-up.
The Match
: Michelle Mullins fought Diana DiBuccio to a 2 - 2 draw.
Moments & Stars
: Rob Brown eliminating both Tom Cowling and Mike "Sputz" Krott in the first throw of the night; Kevin Adams fumbling a Lauren Stopa-thrown bulletball; Ryan Letsche's dominating Game 4 performance; Tom Adams and Wesley Hebrew engaging in several mid-court showdowns; Rob Brown catching a forceful Kevin Adams bulletball as it impactfully connects with his face; two game-saving team regenerations from Mike Edwards
Attendance
: 28 competitors, comprised of 20 men and 8 women.
Other Notes
: DODGEBALL 131 in mid-March was the last time captains were featured; the longest drought ever. DODGEBALL CXXXVII, along with the preceding CXXXVI, are the first two consecutive events to end in a draw under classic rules. This was the second year in a row two women headlined an event during Mother's Day weekend
(see
DODGEBALL 87
)
.
Captain's Statistics
: DiBuccio 3-4-3 : Mullins 0-0-1. DiBuccio became the first competitor in history to fight to a draw three times.
Returning to Action
:
EastCoastDodgeball
welcomed back Jarid Putman, Lenny Weg, and Steve Guarino, all of whom reemerged for the first time since late Spring-2006. Former
Captains Champion
Wesley Hebrew also returned to the dance after a lengthy absence.
DODGEBALL CXL Announcement!
Just when you thought the upcoming 140th dodgeball spectacular on May 31st couldn't get any bigger, it does. As announced at CXXXVII, the winner of the colossal
WOLF-JUAN
confrontation will become the first of six, that's right,
six
captains at the summer sizzler, DODGEBALL 150, in August!
Online Exclusive
: DODGEBALL CXXXVII took place one day before Captain Mullins's 17th birthday.
________________________________________
____________
And then there were THREE ...
DODGEBALL CXXXVIII: 5.17.08
The unresolved finish from the magnificent 137th has left all hardcore 'ballers wanting more. With that being said, the main event for this Saturday's 138th will be the anticipated return bout between "Ghetto Superstar"
Diana DiBuccio
and 2008's female fury
Michelle Mullins
! It's "Round 2" for these titans - will a winner finally emerge?
DODGEBALL 139: 5.24.08
And just when you thought you had all the answers .. match announcement coming mid-week via the
TextMessagingService
!
DODGEBALL CXL: Season 14 Finale on 5.31.08
Undeniably one of the most feverishly-awaited events in the sport's nearly three-year existence.
Justin "Punter" Wolf
locks horns with
"Cockroach" Juan Londono
, with the victor advancing to one of six main event spots at DODGEBALL 150. Get your game-faces on for this one.
Plus, it will indeed be a "Family Affair" when the beloved parents and guardians of all diehard superstars make an appearance at this spring spectacle. Which 'rents will show? Who will unleash the urge and step up to the challenge that is dodgeball? The world finds out May 31.
What an awesome line-up on this
Road to CXL
. Shame on those who miss any of these!
body_html:
DIBUCCIO vs. MULLINS Results from CXXXVII!
"Mom" must be so proud!

Flash Results by Game ... Mullins: 1, 3; DiBuccio: 2, 4
The warriors of Wall High School fought through four physically agonizing rounds only to be shafted of a final result. It's a safe bet that this issue is far from being settled as a rematch for next week's DODGEBALL CXXXVIII has already been signed.

The Rules: Classic two-team match-up.
The Match: Michelle Mullins fought Diana DiBuccio to a 2 - 2 draw.
Moments & Stars: Rob Brown eliminating both Tom Cowling and Mike "Sputz" Krott in the first throw of the night; Kevin Adams fumbling a Lauren Stopa-thrown bulletball; Ryan Letsche's dominating Game 4 performance; Tom Adams and Wesley Hebrew engaging in several mid-court showdowns; Rob Brown catching a forceful Kevin Adams bulletball as it impactfully connects with his face; two game-saving team regenerations from Mike Edwards
Attendance: 28 competitors, comprised of 20 men and 8 women.
Other Notes: DODGEBALL 131 in mid-March was the last time captains were featured; the longest drought ever. DODGEBALL CXXXVII, along with the preceding CXXXVI, are the first two consecutive events to end in a draw under classic rules. This was the second year in a row two women headlined an event during Mother's Day weekend (see DODGEBALL 87).
Captain's Statistics: DiBuccio 3-4-3 : Mullins 0-0-1. DiBuccio became the first competitor in history to fight to a draw three times.
Returning to Action: EastCoastDodgeball welcomed back Jarid Putman, Lenny Weg, and Steve Guarino, all of whom reemerged for the first time since late Spring-2006. Former Captains Champion Wesley Hebrew also returned to the dance after a lengthy absence.

DODGEBALL CXL Announcement!
Just when you thought the upcoming 140th dodgeball spectacular on May 31st couldn't get any bigger, it does. As announced at CXXXVII, the winner of the colossal WOLF-JUAN confrontation will become the first of six, that's right, six captains at the summer sizzler, DODGEBALL 150, in August!

Online Exclusive: DODGEBALL CXXXVII took place one day before Captain Mullins's 17th birthday.

____________________________________________________

And then there were THREE ...


DODGEBALL CXXXVIII: 5.17.08
The unresolved finish from the magnificent 137th has left all hardcore 'ballers wanting more. With that being said, the main event for this Saturday's 138th will be the anticipated return bout between "Ghetto Superstar" Diana DiBuccio and 2008's female fury Michelle Mullins! It's "Round 2" for these titans - will a winner finally emerge?

DODGEBALL 139: 5.24.08
And just when you thought you had all the answers .. match announcement coming mid-week via the TextMessagingService!

DODGEBALL CXL: Season 14 Finale on 5.31.08
Undeniably one of the most feverishly-awaited events in the sport's nearly three-year existence. Justin "Punter" Wolf locks horns with "Cockroach" Juan Londono, with the victor advancing to one of six main event spots at DODGEBALL 150. Get your game-faces on for this one.

Plus, it will indeed be a "Family Affair" when the beloved parents and guardians of all diehard superstars make an appearance at this spring spectacle. Which 'rents will show? Who will unleash the urge and step up to the challenge that is dodgeball? The world finds out May 31.

What an awesome line-up on this Road to CXL. Shame on those who miss any of these!
